Learn about OnlineTranslation.ae, your trusted partner for MOJ-certified legal translation services in Dubai. Licensed by Dubai Economy, we provide court-ready document translation across the UAE.
Your Digital Document Concierge in Dubai
OnlineTranslation.ae operates as a digital document concierge, coordinating MOJ-certified legal translation through a WhatsApp-first workflow.
Document Clearing with a Personal Touch

OnlineTranslation.ae operates as a “Digital Concierge” for legal and official documents. Instead of treating translation as a simple word-swap, we design every engagement around acceptance by UAE courts, government departments, embassies, and free zones.
Our team coordinates translation, certification, stamping, and delivery, so you deal with a single point of contact while we handle the back-and-forth with partners and authorities.
Standard digital drafts are typically delivered within an hour of receiving clear scans of your documents, during working hours.
We pre-validate documents and flag issues before submission, to minimize rejections and wasted visits to government counters.
OnlineTranslation.ae team collaborating in the office

All translations are prepared by Ministry of Justice certified translators and carry official certification designed for acceptance by UAE courts and government authorities.
